text: 6.45: Mt 12.34Kha khesharigi ndɨkndɨgi guma ndava vhen givav kim, ana kamthoon nta nzuai.” Guma the vhɨra ana vov wain vhɨgi thari garim, nta tari ki kha bisaŋ thaneŋ ga tuiga kim, ana nta khargi fhuvara. Guman vhuuŋ, ana ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ana ndava vhen kim, ana tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga mbui. Guma mbatɨk, ana ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgi ana ndava vhen kim, ana tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui.
